presentation.title: Presentation
paragraphs: TAS Automa√ß√£o was founded in 2008 by a group of Engineers from multinational engineering companies, with strong experience in industrial automation and maintenance projects. It started its work offering PLC programming, robots, electrical projects, line simulation, mechanical and pneumatic projects.
The experience acquired in the industry made TAS Automa√ß√£o stand out in the market for offering solutions that serve production, maintenance and projects.
Over time and through market acceptance, it has established partnerships with Siemens, Rockwell, Macomb Community College, Mitsubishi, Atlas Copco and RedLion.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.intro: Currently offers solutions and projects for sectors of industries in general.
items: Line and process simulation with robots.
Electrical, mechanical, hydraulic and pneumatic design.

helpdesk.paragraph: Thinking about minimizing response time in maintenance emergencies, it has a Help Desk sector, where it operates online on the customer's PLC for rapid fault diagnosis.

projectsCarousel.title: Cases
projectsCarousel.description: Manufacturers and bottlers of beverages and food rely on J&A Automation and report on their experiences with our automation lines. Find out first-hand when there are new machine and plant solutions for the beverage and food industry.
